categories.name: Superhero
categories.description: Superhero comics are a type of American comic book that feature costumed crimefighters known as superheroes. These characters possess superhuman abilities and are dedicated to protecting the public.

categories.name: Sci-Fi
categories.description: Science fiction comics are a type of American comic book that feature science fiction stories. These stories are set in the future, in outer space, or in alternate dimensions.

categories.name: Fantasy
categories.description: Fantasy comics are a type of American comic book that feature fantasy stories. These stories are set in magical worlds, with mythical creatures and supernatural elements.

categories.name: Horror
categories.description: Horror comics are a type of American comic book that feature horror stories. These stories are filled with suspense, terror, and supernatural elements.

categories.name: Mystery
categories.description: Mystery comics are a type of American comic book that feature mystery stories. These stories are filled with suspense, intrigue, and unexpected twists.
